DataElement.preferredName: I-PSS 8 Feeling about Current Urinary Condition for Rest of Life Score 7 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how they would feel about spending the rest of their life with their urinary condition just the way it is now, using a 7 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: International Prostate Symptom Score Feeling about Current Urinary Condition for Rest of Life Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia._A question about how an individual feels or felt about spending the rest of their life with their urinary condition just the way it is now._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A screening tool used to screen for, diagnose, track, and manage the symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to help men determine how bothersome their benign prostatic hyperplasia urinary symptoms are and to determine how effective their treatment is._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been unhappy.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been unhappy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been mostly dissatisfied.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been mostly dissatisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating an equal level of satisfaction and dissatisfaction.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating an equal level of satisfaction and dissatisfaction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been mostly satisfied.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been mostly satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally satisfied or pleased.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or has been generally satisfied or pleased.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A feeling of extreme pleasure or satisfaction.

Concepts.definition: A feeling of extreme pleasure or satisfaction.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for CCR study 17C0153 in C3D. mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: If you were to spend the rest
ReferenceDocuments.description: If you were to spend the rest of your life with your urinary condition just the way it is now, how would you feel about that?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
